content: *these quick and easy stash baskets are a stylish storage option for yarn and other craft supplies yarnspirations * --- *skill level * beginner --- **sizes ** *small * 10½ \ 26 5 cm\ diameter x 12 \ 30 5 cm\ high *large * 13½ \ 34 5 cm\ diameter x 14 \ 35 5 cm\ high --- **materials ** bernat® blanket™ 10 5 oz/300 g 258 yds/234 m *small version * dark grey 10044 *2 balls* *large version * light teal 10734 *2 balls* *additional materials * stitch marker ---
